title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 340.7 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 340.7 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) There shall be
a charge of 25 cents per photocopy page for all records which can be
photocopied. However, the commissioner in his discretion may waive the
collection of such a fee on any request for copies of 10 or less
pages. (b) For a record which
cannot be readily photocopied, there shall be a charge equal to the amount of
the actual cost of making a transcript thereof. (c) There shall be no fee charged for
inspection of records, search for records, or for any certification under this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
340.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
